tasks.task: Join the farming conversation and learn about agribusiness online platforms.
subtasks: Introduce Uu Sbongilekele (Sbongile) and discuss her farming business.
Explain the expansion to a bigger space in Akinhof and partnership with TLC Children's Home.
Describe the hydroponic farming setup and incubation program at the 9-hectare space.
Detail the AWIA (African Women in Agriculture) group's structure and projects.
Discuss the incubation process and training provided to women farmers.
Address the challenges faced by women in agriculture and how the program addresses them.
Highlight the online platform (I Am Citizen) for networking and supporting farmers.
Share success stories and impacts of the incubation program and platform.
Offer advice for aspiring farmers based on Sbongile's experience.
Encourage listeners to join the AWIA incubation program and support farming efforts.
